decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to establish control through the use of lands and disruption spells. By repeatedly using Life from the Loam to fill the graveyard and then recur lands like Thespian's Stage and Dark Depths, the deck aims to create a powerful Merit Lage token that can quickly end the game. Additionally, cards like Sphere of Resistance and Boseiju, Who Endures help to slow down opponents and protect key pieces of the combo. The inclusion of cards like Maze of Ith and Ghost Quarter also provide additional ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo utilizing Mystic Forge and various artifacts to generate mana and control the game. It aims to quickly ramp into powerful threats like Karn, the Great Creator and Grim Monolith while also disrupting the opponent with cards like Pithing Needle and Portable Hole. The synergy between cards like Manifold Key, Tezzeret, Cruel Captain, and Candelabra of Tawnos allows for explosive plays and the ability to quickly close out games. The deck has strong ramp and control elements, making it a versatile and powerful option in the Legacy format.

The deck aims to control the game by utilizing lands as a resource, with key cards like Dark Depths, Urza's Saga, and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also focuses on generating mana advantage with Mox Diamond and Exploration, while using Life from the Loam and Crop Rotation to dig for key lands. Additionally, the deck includes utility lands like Bojuka Bog and Maze of Ith for protection and disruption. The deck's win condition revolves around creating powerful land tokens with cards like Thespian's Stage and Malevolent Rumble, overwhelming the opponent with a strong board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently combo off by casting a series of spells that allow the player to mill their entire deck, ultimately winning the game by playing Thassa's Oracle and having no cards left in their library. The deck focuses on using fast mana sources and disruption spells to protect the combo, while also utilizing cards like Pact of Negation to ensure the combo resolves successfully. It aims to win the game in a single turn, catching the opponent off guard with its explosive plays.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on quickly casting powerful Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer while disrupting opponents with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The deck aims to use cards like Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Tomb to accelerate mana and overwhelm opponents with a fast and aggressive strategy. The inclusion of Cavern of Souls helps protect Eldrazi creatures from countermagic, making it difficult for opponents to effectively deal with the deck's threats. With a focus on early aggression and disruptive plays, this deck aims to quickly close out games against opponents in the Legacy format.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively play Eldrazi creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. By utilizing fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and It That Heralds the End. The inclusion of Cavern of Souls helps ensure that Eldrazi spells can't be countered, while cards like Thought-Knot Seer provide disruption and card advantage. This deck focuses on a proactive game plan and aims to close out the game quickly.

This deck utilizes the synergy between lands and control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan while generating strong value through cards like Dark Depths and Life from the Loam. By utilizing cards like Crop Rotation and Exploration, the deck can quickly assemble powerful land combinations to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Disruptor Flute allow for additional disruption and protection, making it difficult for the opponent to execute their strategy effectively. The deck aims to grind out the opponent through attrition and powerful land interactions.

The deck aims to quickly assemble a powerful combo that wins the game in one explosive turn by milling the entire library and putting Thassa's Oracle into play to win the game. Utilizing fast mana ramp, disruption spells, and combo pieces, the deck aims to quickly execute its game plan before the opponent can set up their own strategy. The deck prioritizes speed and efficiency, aiming to win the game quickly and decisively without giving the opponent a chance to respond.

The main concept of this combo deck is to quickly and efficiently fill the graveyard with cards, particularly creatures, in order to win the game with cards like Thassa's Oracle and Dread Return. The deck utilizes a mix of fast mana sources, self-mill cards, and protection spells to execute its game plan. By assembling the right combination of cards, the deck can win the game as early as the first turn, making it a high-risk, high-reward strategy in the Legacy format.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and disruption to control the board. By utilizing powerful creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Amped Raptor, along with efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent while disrupting their strategy. With a mix of creature buffs, removal, and disruptive spells, the deck is designed to maintain pressure on the opponent and dictate the pace of the game.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays like Amped Raptor and Sand Scout, supported by powerful spells like Swords to Plowshares. Using Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion, the deck utilizes red and white mana sources to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The inclusion of Goblin Bombardment adds a direct damage element to keep up the pressure. With a mixture of efficient creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory through swift, relentless attacks.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy using a combination of artifacts and Blue cards. The deck focuses on generating mana and card advantage with cards like Urza's Saga, Mox Opal, Mishra's Bauble, and Emry, Lurker of the Loch. It also includes disruptive elements such as Chalice of the Void and Force of Will to control the game and protect the aggressive creatures like Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer. The goal is to establish a strong board presence and maintain pressure on the opponent to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, backed up by a suite of disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes plenty of card selection with Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistent draws and keep the pressure on the opponent. By efficiently using resources and maintaining a fast pace of play, this UR Aggro deck aims to control the tempo of the game and secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while putting pressure on them with efficient creatures and disruptive spells. The deck aims to control the game tempo by utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's plays, while also maintaining a board presence with creatures like Murktide Regent and Barrowgoyf. Additionally, the deck includes some versatile cards like Daze and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares to further disrupt the opponent's strategy and give the player an advantage in the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent through aggressive creatures and powerful spells. Utilizing cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Delver of Secrets, and Murktide Regent, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat for additional reach and removal. Overall, the deck is designed to be fast, efficient, and relentless in its pursuit of victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing lands to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It includes cards like Thespian's Stage, Life from the Loam, Dark Depths, and Wasteland to generate value and hinder the opponent's board development. The deck also incorporates cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale to protect its own game plan and slow down the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to establish a strong land base while disrupting the opponent's resources to secure victory.
